advices: Take a break and stretch every hour.
Set achievable goals and celebrate your progress.
Practice active listening to improve your relationships.
Prioritize sleep to improve your overall well-being.
Take time to reflect on your accomplishments.
Learn something new every day to keep your mind sharp.
Focus on what you can control, not what you can't.
Stay hydrated throughout the day for better health.
Spend time in nature to reduce stress and boost mood.
Take responsibility for your actions and their consequences.
